name: Run'n Growth
description:
A little platformer game when every time you jump, your scale growth !

It make cool puzzles and fun level to play with different mechanics with coin, 

Asset Pack i used: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer

Gif Recorder i used: https://www.screentogif.com/

Gif Compressor i used: https://www.freeconvert.com/gif-compressor
